=== Purchase Information === Product Title: BMC 8 Sheet Temporary Nail Art Tattoo Effects Hydroplaning Water Transfer Stickers Decals Set - Fashion Beasts Review Date: 2014/01/17 Store: b.m.c Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 3.94 x 0.12 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '700580463874', 'UPC': '700580463874', 'Manufacturer': 'Bundle Monster'} Review Text: These works like a dream the colors are vibrant also. This are an easy way to make a statement with your nails without too much work Review Title: So pretty Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Zig Zag Nail Stickers - SINGLE Style Chevron Nail Stickers - Chevron Nail Art (Classic Black) Review Date: 2014/08/18 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {} Review Text: Work great I use them as guides but they would stick really well as the decoration on nails too! Review Title: Nice! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: THICK Chevron Nail Stickers - Chevron Nail Art (Pretty in Pink) Review Date: 2014/08/18 Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {} Review Text: Work great I use them as guides but they would stick really well as the decoration on nails too! Review Title: Nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Acne Clear Spot Treatment | Best Spot Treatment for Clear Skin Review Date: 2015/10/17 Store: Just Nutritive is JustNaturalSkinCare Product Description: ['In just a few hours your break-out will disappear and your skin will look as if it was never there! This fast acting acne serum contains all natural ingredients in a potent concentration. Designed to attack acne at its source and kill the bacteria that cause acne and prevent more break-outs.'] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 3.9 x 1.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '812326010133', 'Manufacturer': 'Just Natural Products', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: It works pretty well but does take awhile to heal spots. But i find if i just put it on it tends to work longer and better. It doesnt dry skin out either. Review Title: Nice helpful with breakouts Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bundle Monster 9in1 Fashion Hair Design Styling Tools Accessories Kit- Bun Maker, Roller, Braid Twist, Elastics, Pins for BRUNETTE Hair Color Review Date: 2016/02/17 Store: Bundle Monster Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 7.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '700580457606', 'UPC': '700580457606', 'Manufacturer': 'Bundle Monster'} Review Text: DOES NOT COME WITH INSTRUCTION SHEET AS SHOWN!!

These are okay items... The hair bands are really cheap and i just tossed them out. i wish i would have just bought items separately. Review Title: its okay.... raw_response:
**Preferences and Trends Summary:**

- **Nail Art Enthusiast**: Frequent purchases of nail art accessories indicate a strong interest in nail decoration, favors vibrant and statement-making designs.
- **Positive Experience**: Reviews reflect satisfaction with products, particularly those offering ease of use and aesthetic appeal.
- **Variety in Styles**: Engages with different styles of nail stickers (temporary tattoos, chevron patterns), suggesting an affinity for both classic and bold designs.
- **Skincare Awareness**: Also invests in skincare products, specifically those targeted at acne, showing a concern for skin health and effective solutions.
- **DIY and Creativity**: Uses specialized tools and products for personal grooming, indicating a preference for DIY beauty solutions.
- **Mixed Satisfaction**: While many items received high ratings, there are instances of dissatisfaction with quality, particularly in hair accessories, highlighting a selective nature in product choices. 
- **Innovation in Use**: Adapts products creatively for nail care, demonstrating resourcefulness and a desire for multifunctionality in beauty purchases.

target_interaction.title: Worked great
target_interaction.text: Worked great but for sure a learning curve I wish it was a larger size bag too.
target_interaction.title_meta: KoluaWax | Beach Legs Hard Wax Beads (1lb Bag) | For Legs, Back & More | Lavender
features: INCLUDES: 1lb Bag Beach Legs Hard Wax Beads

FORMULATED FOR LEGS, BACK & BEYOND: Beach Legs is our most elastic formula, making it perfect for curvy areas — like around the knees and on the back. Plus, it can be applied in sections 4x larger than most hard wax.
UP TO 6 WEEKS OF SMOOTH: Salon-quality results for a fraction of the price. Wax on your schedule, right from the comfort of home.
SAVE TIME & MONEY: Salons charge up to $75 for a leg wax. This bag contains enough wax beads for 10+ full leg waxes — so you can save money and skip long visits to the salon.
SKIP THE STRIPS: No more messing with hard-to-handle wax strips. Just apply with an applicator stick and let the wax do the rest.

videos.title: Beach Legs is extra elastic for large areas.
Introducing Our Most Elastic Hard Wax Beads
Spreads easily over curves, like knees!
